attributes.action: ask the government to reduce the amount of bonus to be received by the new head of the royal bank of scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This amount of £ 9,oooo is unacceptable in the present financial crisis of the country and before any payback has been received of the £70,0000 loan to the bank.We would like the Prime Minister to ask the government to reduce the amount of the bonus substanitially until the country is in a better financial situation.
